Title: Awkward moments and pitfalls on the Conservative campaign trail - BBC News
Info: the race between final candidates rishi sunak and liz truss to be the new leader of the conservative party - and the uk's next prime minister - is drawing to a close. the bbc looks back at memorable moments from the leadership contest. © 2022 bbc. the bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites. read about our approach to external linking.
